bug.author: MarcSkovMadsen
bug.summary: number_input does not accept key as input
bug.description:
TypeError: number_input() got an unexpected keyword argument 'key' from import streamlit as st st.number_input("Select number", 0, 100, 5, key="key") Debug info
Streamlit version: 0.49

comments.comment:
Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/MarcSkovMadsen>@MarcSkovMadsen</denchmark-link> , We fixed this on the develop branch. Here is the commit: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/streamlit/streamlit/commit/9caa41438bcb2e651c718d7e4c58d45616ba6a0c>9caa414</denchmark-link> . PR: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/streamlit/streamlit/pull/571>#571</denchmark-link>
It should be coming up in the next release.
